decisions.name: Accountant_Portal_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Accountant Portal Check for Blank Values

rules.name: Accountant_Portal_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR (5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11)) OR 12 OR (13 AND (14 OR 15)) OR (16 AND 17 AND (18 OR (19 AND 20))) OR (21 AND 22)
rules.label: Accountant Portal Blank Values

rules.name: Advisory_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR (5 AND (6 OR 7)) OR 8 OR 9 OR 10
rules.label: Advisory Blank Values

decisions.name: Assignment_Adjustment_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Assignment Adjustment Check for Blank Values

rules.name: Assignment_Adjustment_Blank_Values

rules.name: Bookkeeping_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR (6 AND (7 OR 8)) OR 9 OR 10 OR 11
rules.label: Bookkeeping Blank Values

Flow.description: Flow for use with the portal to create cases

formulas.name: Determine_Fulfillment_Type
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Advisory}, {!Advisory}, {!Fulfillment_Type}, 'Bank Sync', 'Bank Sync', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Bookkeeping}, 'CAS Management', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Entity_Management}, {!Entity_Management}, {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Payroll}, 'CAS Management', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Portal_Issues_Updates}, 'Accountant Portal', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Tax_Compliance}, {!Tax_Compliance}, '')

formulas.description: Checks if we've already been passed the Contact ID, otherwise sets the Case Contact to be the Account's Primary Contact
formulas.name: DetermineContactID

formulas.description: Properly sets the Type field from the Fulfillment_Type picklist
formulas.name: Payroll_Bookkeeping_Portal_FulfillmentType
Proactive_Product_Type
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Loop_through_Proactive_Sub_Lines.Product__r.Name}, 'LLC State Filing Fee', 'Dynamic Entity', 'Corp State Filing Fee', 'Dynamic Entity', 'Foreign Qualification - LLC', 'Dynamic Entity', 'Back Bookkeeping', 'Dynamic Bookkeeping', 'Non-Profit Back Bookkeeping', 'Dynamic Bookkeeping', ' Standard')

formulas.description: The Proactive Concession Amount based on the product's cost-to-service * quantity
formulas.name: Proactive_Product_Type_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The price per unit multiplied by the quantity of the line items
formulas.name: Proactive_Sub_Line_Total_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected bookkeeping subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Bookkeeping_Proactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected bookkeeping subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Bookkeeping_Reactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected entity formation subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Entity_Formation_Proactive_Concession_Amount
formulas.expression: IF( {!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Proactive_Products.Name} = 'LLC State Filing Fee', {!Entity_Formation_Proactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!LLC_State_Filing_Fee_Cost_to_Service}, IF({!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Proactive_Products.Name} = 'Corp State Filing Fee', {!Entity_Formation_Proactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!Corp_State_Filing_Fee_Cost_to_Service}, IF({!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Proactive_Products.Name} = 'Foreign Qualification - LLC', {!Entity_Formation_Proactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!Foreign_Qualification_LLC_Cost_to_Service}, {!Entity_Formation_Proactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Proactive_Products.Cost_to_Service__c})))

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected entity formation subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Entity_Formation_Reactive_Concession_Amount
formulas.expression: IF( {!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Reactive_Products.Name} = 'LLC State Filing Fee', {!Entity_Formation_Reactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!LLC_State_Filing_Fee_Cost_to_Service}, IF({!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Reactive_Products.Name} = 'Corp State Filing Fee', {!Entity_Formation_Proactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!Corp_State_Filing_Fee_Cost_to_Service}, IF({!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Reactive_Products.Name} = 'Foreign Qualification - LLC', {!Entity_Formation_Reactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!Foreign_Qualification_LLC_Cost_to_Service}, {!Entity_Formation_Reactive_Product_Quantity_Value}*{!Update_Quantity_for_Selected_Entity_Formation_Reactive_Products.Cost_to_Service__c})))

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected Payroll subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Payroll_Proactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected Payroll subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Payroll_Reactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Proactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Reactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected Tax Prep and Advisory subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Tax_Prep_and_Advisory_Proactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: The Cost-to-Service total for the selected Tax Prep and Advisory subscription lines times the quantity needed
formulas.name: Selected_Tax_Prep_and_Advisory_Reactive_Concession_Amount

formulas.description: Formula to connect the Sub-Type to the related products
formulas.name: Sub_Type_Value
formulas.expression: CASE( TEXT({!CaseRecord.Sub_Type__c}), 'Advisory Services', 'Advisory', 'Bookkeeping', 'Bookkeeping', 'Entity Services', 'Entity Formation', 'Payroll', 'Payroll', 'Tax Compliance', 'Tax', 'Other')

formulas.description: The sum of selected proactive and reactive concession costs
formulas.name: Total_Selected_Concession_Cost

formulas.description: Transforms the value to standardize in the Accountant Portal User field
formulas.name: TransformPortalUserName

Flow.label: Case Creation Flow

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Extra_Details_Explain
fields.fieldText: Please add any additional details to help resolve the case as quickly as possible. All fields are required.

fields.name: Extra_Users_Explain
fields.fieldText: If more than one additional user is required, enter their name, phone number, and email address on separate lines in the Description field

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Case_Final_Review_Header
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1}Review Case details before submitting{!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Type_Explanation
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} What kind of portal issues needs to be resolved?

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Account_Updates_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Client needs assistance with their Portal Account. This may include adding an additional user, an additional business, or updating their email address {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Banking_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Please select the specific type of bank issue that needs to be addressed: {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Portal_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Client is seeing page errors when trying to use the Portal. Please select an error below. {!Brand_Style_Close}


If the client is having trouble with the merchant payment portion of the Portal, please have them call 844-577-5570 or submit a ticket to invoicing@1800accountant.com

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Additional_Business_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Client needs an additional business added to their Portal account. {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Additional_User_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Client needs an additional user added to their Portal account. Please enter the required fields below: {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Email_Update_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Client needs an update to their email address on their account. Please enter the details in the Description field {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Bank_Sync_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues that involve problems with the client's bank syncing. Please also fill out the Issue Type and Error Type fields {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_CSV_Upload_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Request to upload a CSV file for the client {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Duplicate_Transactions_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues with duplicate transactions in their portal account {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Missing_Transactions_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues with missing transactions in their portal account {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Feature_Walkthrough_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} A walkthrough of the portal with the client for a particular feature, the VTO, or site {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_1099_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Errors with the 1099 feature in the Portal {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Invoices_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Errors with the Invoices feature in the Portal {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Messages_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Errors with the Messages feature in the Portal {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Mileage_Tracker_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Errors with the Mileage Tracker feature in the Portal {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Password_Reset_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Assistance with a password reset in the Portal {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_VTO_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Errors with the VTO feature in the Portal {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Issue_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} The reason for the creation of the case (client needs additional help or education, etc){!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Issue_Banking_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} The name of the banking service provider which the client is experiencing issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Additional_User_Extra_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} If the client needs more than one additional user, please add all required information into the Description field on the next screen {!Brand_Style_Close}﻿

fields.name: Extra_User_Unique_Email
fields.fieldText: Please enter an email address that is unique from the existing client's email address

fields.name: Portal_Issues_Bank_Name_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Please provide the name(s) of the client's bank(s) experiencing issues. If more than one bank is having issues then separate the bank names by commas {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Error_Type_Other_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} If the client is seeing other errors in the portal, please add relevant details in the "Other:" field {!Brand_Style_Close}﻿

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Error
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


You must fill out all the fields on the previous screens to create your case.


﻿Please click "Previous" to fill out the required fields before submitting your case

fields.name: Advisory_Extra_Details_Explain
fields.fieldText: Please add any additional details to help resolve the case as quickly as possible. All fields are required

fields.name: Advisory_Case_Final_Review_Header
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1}Review Case details before submitting{!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Advisory_Type_Explanation
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} Please select the specific type of Advisory issue that needs to be addressed: {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Advisory_Assignment_Adjustment_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Issues that require a change in the client's Remote Tax Advisor {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Advisory_New_Appointment_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues with the client's appointments (errors, missed appointments or requests for new or rescheduled appointments) {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Advisory_Escalation_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues where the client is unhappy and request the issue to be escalated {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Advisory_Offboarding_Sub_Type_Explain

fields.fieldText: Type of Issue

fields.name: Portal_Type_of_Issue
fields.fieldText: Type of Issue

fields.name: Billing_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Create a case for the Billing Team.


This option may include issues such as:


  • Billing Inquiries
  • Custom Quotes
  • Discount Requests
  • Invoice or Payment Issues
  • Cancellation Requests

﻿If the client is having trouble with the merchant payment portion of the Portal, please have them call 844-577-5570 or submit a ticket to invoicing@1800accountant.com

fields.name: Fulfillment_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Create a case for the Fulfillment Team.


This option may include issues such as:


  • Tax Compliance
  • Reassignments
  • Advisory
  • Bookkeeping
  • Payroll
  • Entity Formation
  • Portal Issues
  • Concession Requests
  • Technical Support, Etc.

fields.name: Quality_Assurance_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Create a case for the Quality Assurance Team.


This option may include issues for the following teams:


  • Billing
  • Fulfillment
  • Lead Partner Escalation
  • Sales
  • Payment Disputes
  • Other

fields.name: Sales_BNA_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Create a case for the BNA Team.


This option may include issues such as:


  • Initiating contact from BNA reps for upsell opportunities

fields.name: Duplicate_Error
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


A case of the same type already exists for this Account.


﻿Please use one of the existing cases below rather than create a duplicate.

fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while creating the case. This can sometimes occur if you change the case Type on the review screen.


Please either return to the previous screen to correct the issue or start from the beginning.

screens.name: Type_of_Billing_Issue
screens.label: Type of Billing Issue

fields.name: Select_Billing_Case_Type
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} Please select a Type and Sub-Type for the case {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Invoice_And_Payments_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Cases that pertain to a client's questions/issues with a subscription, invoice, or a transaction {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Subscription_Review_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Cases for either a partial or full cancellation request {!Brand_Style_Close}


This case type should ONLY be submitted when a direct request to cancel is received from the client

fields.name: Billing_Inquiry_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H3} General billing questions about their subscription, invoice, or transaction. Examples include:

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} What is my renewal date?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}What services am I paying for?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}When is my next invoice due?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}I have not received my refund yet (issued by 1-800Acountant, not their tax refund)
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Why did my payment decline?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}I need assistance updating my billing address
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}I'd like to remove a payment method {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Custom_Quote_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for either a custom quote to be created or for modifications made to an existing quote. Includes non-standard pricing or products, quantity adjustments, adding items, or revising pricing {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Discount_Request_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a special discount for the client's order. Includes volume discounts, promotional pricing, or unique offers {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Payment_Disputes_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Payment Dispute issues or questions {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Service_Concession_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests by supervisors or managers to add a one-time, non-renewable $0 subscription to retain a client. The service concession must address client issues or service gaps and ensure client retention to be approved {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Cancel_Request_Sub_type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a full subscription cancellation of a client's services {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Partial_Cancel_Request_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a partial cancellation of a client's services {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Prevention_Alert_Sub_Type_Category_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a resolution of a prevention alert {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Pre_Arbitration_Sub_Type_Category_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a resolution of a pre-arbitration alert {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Retrieval_Request_Sub_Type_Category_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a resolution of a retrieval request alert {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Chargeback_Sub_Type_Category_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a resolution of a chargeback alert {!Brand_Style_Close}

screens.helpText: Please be sure to fill out both fields.

fields.name: BNA_Display
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H1} Please be specific on what additional services or products the client needs from the Business Needs Analysis team.

{!Brand_Style_Close}


All fields are required.


﻿If the client needs an appointment scheduled, please use the universal scheduler rather than create a case

fields.name: Fulfillment_Display
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} What's the primary type of fulfillment-related issue that needs to be addressed? {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Fulfillment_Type
fields.fieldText: Primary Issue

fields.name: Case_Secondary_Reason_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Note: Bank Sync issues are now part of the Portal Issues / Updates category. {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Advisory_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Advisory {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Missed Discovery appointments, Advisory appointments, or other Advisory issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Bookkeeping_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Bookkeeping {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Escalation, Offboarding, or other Bookkeeping issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Concession_Request_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concession Request {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a subscription line concession {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Entity_Management_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Entity Management {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Submit requests for Formations, EIN, Registered Agent, Dissolutions, etc. {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Payroll_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Payroll {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Escalation, Offboarding, or other Payroll issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Portal_Issues_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Portal Issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Banking issues (sync issues, duplicate or missing transactions, CSV uploads)
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} VTO lock issues (assuming payment is verified)
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}1-800Accountant Access "Free Trial Ended" issues (assuming payment is verified)
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Can't message team members
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Adding a Partner Account
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Adding an additional Business Account
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}General Portal issues (password resets, errors, feature issues, walkthroughs, etc.){!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Reassignments_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Reassignments {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Reassignment requests for Advisory, Tax Preparer, Bookkeeping, or Payroll. Ex. "I'd like a new advisor"
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Reassignment requests for Industry or language
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Issues that need to be escalated to a manager
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Offboarding notices for services (Subscription should be cancelled before this case is created){!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Tax Compliance {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Return Issues, Notices, Reassignments, Form 1023, Sales & Use Tax, or other issues ex. "There were errors on my taxes"{!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Quality_Assurance_Display
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} What kind of Quality Assurance-related issue needs to be addressed? {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Billing_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with Billing {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Fulfillment_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with Fulfillment {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Lead_Partner_Escalation_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues reported by a lead partner that requires escalation {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Payment_Disputes_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with payment disputes {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Sales_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with Sales {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Other_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Other issues needing attention from the Quality Assurance Team. This includes Portal issues or other items that don't fit into any existing category{!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Other_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} You must complete this field in order to submit the case {!Brand_Style_Close}
